Title: The Others
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Fionnula Flanagan, Christopher Eccleston, Alakina Mann
Plot: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 29 wins & 54 nominations.
Production: Lucky Red, Miramax Films, Sogecine, Cruise-Wagner Productions
